results.title: The association of metformin use with prostate cancer aggressiveness among Black Americans and White Americans in a population-based study.
results.text_hl: The association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use with @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_Cancer_Hereditary_7</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565201 @@@prostate cancer aggressiveness@@@ among Black Americans and White Americans in a population-based study.

citations.NLM: Khan S, Cai J, Nielsen ME, Troester MA, Mohler JL, Fontham ETH, Farnan L, Drake BF, Olshan AF, Bensen JT. The association of metformin use with prostate cancer aggressiveness among Black Americans and White Americans in a population-based study. Cancer Causes Control. 2018 Nov;29(11):1143-1150. PMID: 30267174

results.title: Metformin Induces Apoptosis and Cell Cycle Arrest Mediated by Oxidative Stress, AMPK and FOXO3a in MCF-7 Breast Cancer Cells
results.text_hl: In this study, we examined the antiproliferative role and mechanism of action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Prostate_Cancer_Hereditary_7</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565201 @@@MCF-7 cancer@@@ cells treated with 10 mM of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for 24, 48, and 72 hours.

citations.NLM: Queiroz EA, Puukila S, Eichler R, Sampaio SC, Forsyth HL, Lees SJ, Barbosa AM, Dekker RF, Fortes ZB, Khaper N. Metformin Induces Apoptosis and Cell Cycle Arrest Mediated by Oxidative Stress, AMPK and FOXO3a in MCF-7 Breast Cancer Cells PLoS One. 2014;9(5):e98207. PMID: 24858012
